results.title: New love
results.creator_credit: Jayt Buchanan and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
A captivating piece of animation about the wonderment of new love - the hopes and dreams and the possibilities. Dialogue is replaced by the simple flowing of words as they weave in and out and around the lovers. Music score adapted from the track New Love by Cam Butler and Silver Ray.
Graduate work from an AIM (Centre for Animation and Interactive Media) RMIT graduate, 2006.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jayt Buchanan and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT

results.title: Karma
results.creator_credit: Shu Wang and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
Stylish and artistic 3D animation explores the karmic implications of eating animals.
Graduate work from an AIM (Centre for Animation and Interactive Media) RMIT graduate, 2006.

results.description:

results.title: An Inner passion
results.creator_credit: Hung Lin and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
Hand-drawn 2-D animated moral tale of a baker and his assistant and how one person’s passion can inspire and change the actions of their bullying and intolerant boss.
Original music score by James Hodson. No dialogue.
Graduate work from an AIM (Centre for Animation and Interactive Media) RMIT graduate, 2006.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Hung Lin and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.description:

results.title: Story of standards
results.creator_credit: Larry Gosnell, Lawrence Cherry, Evelyn Cherry and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: There are federal, provincial and municipal inspection services to grade and maintain the quality of agriculturally produced foods—meat, tinned goods, fresh produce and dairy products.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Larry Gosnell, Lawrence Cherry, Evelyn Cherry and National Film Board of Canada
results.description: There are federal, provincial and municipal inspection services to grade and maintain the quality of agriculturally produced foods—meat, tinned goods, fresh produce and dairy products.
description_for_label: There are federal, provincial and municipal inspection services to grade and maintain the quality of agriculturally produced foods—meat, tinned goods, fresh produce and dairy products.

results.title: Father's kite
results.creator_credit: John Shen and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
Poetic 2-D hand-drawn animated tale of a father/son relationship as they share the joys of flying a kite. Music composed and performed by John Shen. No dialogue.
Graduate work from an AIM (Centre for Animation and Interactive Media) RMIT graduate, 2006.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John Shen and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.description:

results.title: Story of Peter and the Potter
results.creator_credit: Donald Peters and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: When Peter accidentally breaks a glass bowl intended as a birthday gift for his mother, Mr. and Mrs. Deichmann and their daughter Anneke, all artisans in clay, come to the rescue and make him one of their designs while Peter watches. Every stage, from the first turn of the potter’s wheel to the final glazing and baking, is shown.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Donald Peters and National Film Board of Canada
results.description: When Peter accidentally breaks a glass bowl intended as a birthday gift for his mother, Mr. and Mrs. Deichmann and their daughter Anneke, all artisans in clay, come to the rescue and make him one of their designs while Peter watches. Every stage, from the first turn of the potter’s wheel to the final glazing and baking, is shown.

Every stage, from the first turn of the potter’s wheel to the final glazing and baking, is shown.

results.title: Storms (Captioned)
results.brief_description: This program teaches children about the basic forces of weather. Demonstrations using everyday objects to illustrate rising warm air, falling cool air and the water cycle. Original animation illustrates causes of lightning, thunder and tornadoes, while satellite views of hurricanes show their swirling winds.
